site_name: SAVE THEM ALL, LIFESAVERS RESCUE TRANSPORT

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:35am on July 12,
2023.
Upon arrival to the facility, the inspector attempted to contact the registrant via the phone number on file for the facility.
The inspector waited 30 minutes before leaving the facility.
End Section
